name: Role of the Dice (Break Games)
description:
Info

Role of the Dice is a game I made in one day for the GMTK Game Jam of 2022, where each die has its own role! Originally I planned on having a way to control some of the dice but I realised I didn't have enough time (for many other things as well) and the idea wouldn't have worked too well anyway. The main purpose of this jam for me was to see if I still know how to use Unity after not touching it since last year's jam, which thankfully I still can, but with that said, I do still believe this is my worst jam game yet lol

Credits

Music: BBandRage - opengameart.org
SFX: Kenney & freesound.org
Scripts (AudioManager and Pathfinder): Brackeys & arongranberg.com
